DataElement.preferredName: Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale Past Week Symptom Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The text response describing other symptoms that have not been previously listed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale Past Week Other Symptom
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A patient-rated instrument developed to provide multidimensional information about a diverse group of common symptoms. This 32-question, self-rated questionnaire evaluates the prevalence, characteristics, and distress associated with each of the symptoms._The most recent week, including today._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A patient-rated instrument developed to provide multidimensional information about a diverse group of common symptoms. This 32-question, self-rated questionnaire evaluates the prevalence, characteristics, and distress associated with each of the symptoms.

Concepts.definition: A patient-rated instrument developed to provide multidimensional information about a diverse group of common symptoms. This 32-question, self-rated questionnaire evaluates the prevalence, characteristics, and distress associated with each of the symptoms.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs
